scripts.build: npm run build:lite:web && npm run build:full:cjs && npm run build:full:web && npm run build:full:esm && npm run build:examples && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:full:cjs: mkdirp npm && rollup -m -f cjs index.js --file npm/index.cjs.js && terser --ecma 8 --module --mangle --compress --mangle-props regex=/^lemnPrivate/ npm/index.cjs.js --output npm/index.cjs.min.js --source-map url=index.cjs.min.js.map,includeSources,content=npm/index.cjs.js.map
scripts.build:full:esm: mkdirp npm && rollup -m -f esm index.js --file npm/index.js && terser --ecma 8 --module --mangle --compress --mangle-props regex=/^lemnPrivate/ npm/index.js --output npm/index.min.js --source-map url=index.min.js.map,includeSources,content=npm/index.js.map
scripts.build:full:web: mkdirp -p dist dist/$npm_package_version && rollup -m -f iife -n lemn index.js --file dist/lemn.js && terser --ecma 8 --mangle --compress --mangle-props regex=/^lemnPrivate/  dist/lemn.js --output dist/lemn.min.js --source-map url=lemn.min.js.map,includeSources,content=dist/lemn.js.map && cp dist/lemn.js dist/lemn.js.map dist/lemn.min.js dist/lemn.min.js.map dist/$npm_package_version
scripts.build:lite:web: mkdirp -p dist dist/$npm_package_version && rollup -m -f iife -n lemn lite.js --file dist/lemn.lite.js && terser --ecma 8 --mangle --compress --mangle-props regex=/^lemnPrivate/ dist/lemn.lite.js --output dist/lemn.lite.min.js --source-map url=lemn.lite.min.js.map,includeSources,content=dist/lemn.lite.js.map && cp dist/lemn.lite.js dist/lemn.lite.js.map dist/lemn.lite.min.js dist/lemn.lite.min.js.map dist/$npm_package_version
scripts.build:examples: NODE_ENV=production webpack --config examples/webpack.config.js && mv dist/examples/index.* dist
scripts.test:dll: NODE_ENV=test WEBPACK_STDOUT=1 WEBPACK_USE_TEST_DLL=1 webpack --config build/webpack.config.js --entry ./tests/index | cat tmp/test/dll.js - | tape-run
